00175 typedef enum
00176 {
00177   fpuAccessDenied         = (0x0 << 20),  
00178   fpuAccessPrivilegedOnly = (0x5 << 20),  
00179   fpuAccessReserved       = (0xA << 20),  
00180   fpuAccessFull           = (0xF << 20)

00200 __STATIC_INLINE void SYSTEM_FpuAccessModeSet(SYSTEM_FpuAccess_TypeDef accessMode)
00201 {
00202   SCB->CPACR = (SCB->CPACR & ~(0xF << 20)) | accessMode;
00203 }
00204 #endif

00213 __STATIC_INLINE uint64_t SYSTEM_GetUnique(void)
00214 {
00215   return (uint64_t)((uint64_t)DEVINFO->UNIQUEH << 32) | (uint64_t)DEVINFO->UNIQUEL;
00216 }
00217 
00218 /***************************************************************************/
00225 __STATIC_INLINE uint8_t SYSTEM_GetProdRev(void)
00226 {
00227   return (DEVINFO->PART & _DEVINFO_PART_PROD_REV_MASK)
00228          >> _DEVINFO_PART_PROD_REV_SHIFT;
00229 }
00230 
00231 /***************************************************************************/
00243 __STATIC_INLINE uint16_t SYSTEM_GetSRAMSize(void)
00244 {
00245 #if defined(_EFM32_GECKO_FAMILY)
00246   /* Early Gecko devices had a bug where SRAM and Flash size were swapped. */
00247   if (SYSTEM_GetProdRev() < 5)
00248   {
00249     return (DEVINFO->MSIZE & _DEVINFO_MSIZE_FLASH_MASK)
00250            >> _DEVINFO_MSIZE_FLASH_SHIFT;
00251   }
00252 #endif
00253   return (DEVINFO->MSIZE & _DEVINFO_MSIZE_SRAM_MASK)
00254          >> _DEVINFO_MSIZE_SRAM_SHIFT;
00255 }
00256 
00257 /***************************************************************************/
00269 __STATIC_INLINE uint16_t SYSTEM_GetFlashSize(void)
00270 {
00271 #if defined(_EFM32_GECKO_FAMILY)
00272   /* Early Gecko devices had a bug where SRAM and Flash size were swapped. */
00273   if (SYSTEM_GetProdRev() < 5)
00274   {
00275     return (DEVINFO->MSIZE & _DEVINFO_MSIZE_SRAM_MASK)
00276            >> _DEVINFO_MSIZE_SRAM_SHIFT;
00277   }
00278 #endif
00279   return (DEVINFO->MSIZE & _DEVINFO_MSIZE_FLASH_MASK)
00280          >> _DEVINFO_MSIZE_FLASH_SHIFT;
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 /***************************************************************************/
00296 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t SYSTEM_GetFlashPageSize(void)
00297 {
00298   uint32_t tmp;
00299 
00300 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY)
00301   if (SYSTEM_GetProdRev() < 18)
00302   {
00303     /* Early Giant/Leopard devices did not have MEMINFO in DEVINFO. */
00304     return FLASH_PAGE_SIZE;
00305   }
00306 #elif defined(_EFM32_ZERO_FAMILY)
00307   if (SYSTEM_GetProdRev() < 24)
00308   {
00309     /* Early Zero devices have an incorrect DEVINFO flash page size */
00310     return FLASH_PAGE_SIZE;
00311   }
00312 #endif
00313 
00314   tmp = (DEVINFO->MEMINFO & _DEVINFO_MEMINFO_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE_MASK)
00315         >> _DEVINFO_MEMINFO_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE_SHIFT;
00316 
00317   return 1 << ((tmp + 10) & 0xFF);
00318 }
00319

00328 __STATIC_INLINE uint16_t SYSTEM_GetPartNumber(void)
00329 {
00330   return (DEVINFO->PART & _DEVINFO_PART_DEVICE_NUMBER_MASK)
00331          >> _DEVINFO_PART_DEVICE_NUMBER_SHIFT;
00332 }

00348 __STATIC_INLINE SYSTEM_PartFamily_TypeDef SYSTEM_GetFamily(void)
00349 {
00350   return (SYSTEM_PartFamily_TypeDef)
00351          ((DEVINFO->PART & _DEVINFO_PART_DEVICE_FAMILY_MASK)
00352           >> _DEVINFO_PART_DEVICE_FAMILY_SHIFT);
00353 }

00364 {
00365   return (DEVINFO->CAL & _DEVINFO_CAL_TEMP_MASK)
00366          >> _DEVINFO_CAL_TEMP_SHIFT;
00367 }
